original_text: “Again, it will be like a man going on a journey, who called his servants and entrusted his wealth to them.
korean_text: 또 어떤 사람이 타국에 갈 때 그 종들을 불러 자기 소유를 맡김과 같으니

sentences.original_text: Again, it will be like a man going on a journey
sentences.korean_translation: 다시, 그것은 여행을 떠나는 한 사람과 같을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and entrusted his wealth to them
